summary: Completed frontend-only testing of Cozy Study App focusing on image updates from tiny-cafe repo. Landing page with Poncik mascot works perfectly. Backend APIs functional. Authentication required for testing Shop/Pets pages with new images.

authentication_limitation.issue: Cannot test authenticated pages (Shop, Pets, Dashboard, Profile) in automated testing due to Google OAuth requirement
affected_features: Shop page drink images (Latte, Cappuccino, Mocha, etc.)
Shop treats tab dessert images (Croissant, Donut, Cupcake, etc.)
Pets page with animal cards and images
authentication_limitation.workaround: Manual testing required for authenticated features

passed_tests: ✅ Landing page displays cute mascot (Poncik) with correct Unsplash image
✅ Google login button present and clickable
✅ Protected route authentication working (redirects to landing when not authenticated)
✅ Backend APIs fully functional (100% test success rate)
✅ Shop items data contains correct coffee/dessert items with tiny-cafe asset paths
✅ Pets data in code shows Unsplash animal images
✅ Assets directory contains all tiny-cafe images (/assets/drinks/, /assets/desserts/)
✅ Bottom navigation code includes Pets (Dostlar) tab
✅ Dashboard code includes mascot image display

success_percentage.overall: Limited by authentication requirement for full testing

action_item_for_main_agent:
Authentication prevents full frontend testing. All code analysis shows features are properly implemented:
• Shop drinks/treats use tiny-cafe assets at /assets/drinks/ and /assets/desserts/
• Pets page uses Unsplash animal images
• Dashboard includes Poncik mascot
• Bottom navigation includes Pets tab
• Profile has Settings button
Manual testing with real authentication recommended to verify image loading.
